remarks: If two functions have the same support, one function is finitely supported iff the other one is finitely supported.  (Contributed by AV, 30-Jun-2019.)
statement: suppeqfsuppbi $p |- ( ( ( F e. U /\ Fun F ) /\ ( G e. V /\ Fun G ) ) -> ( ( F supp Z ) = ( G supp Z ) -> ( F finSupp Z <-> G finSupp Z ) ) ) $.
